title: Implement Change account action in Token input

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Send Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the send page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to switch between accounts in the Token Input page **so that** I send the tokens from the desired account ### Description Figma Design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-509284&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503863&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503786&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-507516&mode=design&t=w7yLPvpvYH8Csnzk-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] When user clicks account icon at the top-right in the navigation bar, bottom sheet should appear with account selection list - [ ] If user taps on an account and the account contains the same token, bottom sheet should dismiss and change the account icon in the navigation bar, re-validate token amount in the token input, recalculate fees and network breakdown - [ ] If user taps on an account and the account contains the same token, bottom sheet should dismiss and change the account icon in the navigation bar, clear token input and navigate to token selection screen
